alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 4:10PM AKST until February 17 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THURSDAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Easterly winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibilities reduced to one half mile. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...From 9 PM Thursday to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will decrease late Thursday evening with the onset of snow along the Kuskokwim Delta coast. Snow will progress from south to north through the night. The strongest winds and worst visibilities are expected along the coast. By Friday morning the main front will push north of the area and steady snow will turn to snow showers, which should allow visibility to improve.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
